sentences.en: A veracious short - term electricity price forecasting can help a market effective bidding decisions.
sentences.cn: 准确的 短期 电价预测可为市场参与者的竞价策略提供指导,直接影响着参与者的利益.

sentences.en: Miss Stackpole was a strictly veracious reporter.
sentences.cn: 斯坦克波尔小姐是一丝不苟、实事求是的记者.

sentences.en: With the rapid development of network and communication technologies, there comes an urgent and higher requirement on the verification, which should be more veracious, safe and practicable.
sentences.cn: 随着网络技术与通信技术的飞速发展，现代社会对个人身份识别的准确性、安全性与实用性提出了更高的要求。

words.tran_cn: 诚实；精确性；老实；说真实话
